com.koalog.util.swing.control
Class ElementPeer

java.lang.Object
  com.koalog.util.swing.control.ElementPeer
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.tree.TreeCellRenderer
public class ElementPeer
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.tree.TreeCellRenderer

A base class for XML DOM element peers. To create a peer class for an element type, subclass this class, and override, at least, toString(). To display different icons, also override getRenderer() so that it returns a class shared instance of TreeCellRenderer.

getRenderer

public javax.swing.tree.TreeCellRenderer getRenderer()
Get the tree cell renderer that should render this object. It should return a class shared instance for better performances.

Returns:
The cell renderer to use for this object.
